text: First time taking my time to come down to FutureGrail, which is an amazing watch museum for watch & horology enthusiast to learn more about the vintage luxury timepieces, as well admiring all well-preserved and maintained antique pocket watches & other timepiece collections. Happy to bring more friends and collector to come down here in the near future!

Futuregrail is the best place to learn on Watch Terminology üíê

Alongside each piece were notes with specifications written thoughtfully ‚ù§Ô∏è

Was hoping to see Omega but Futuregrail focuses on Patek Phillipe for their Vintage Pieces but hey, it's free admission & so so value added when education sets in üôèüôè.

This museum opened my eyes to the world of Enamel Pieces to me ‚ú®

The thought of creating true to life images on minute surface areas in the past bewilders me as they had little devices for it, as with the chisels too ‚ù§Ô∏è.

Details were extremely intricate and it surely took great skills delicately to commit to each piece ‚ú®

Such a pleasure to my soul to be in view of these Vintage Time Pieces üî•

Thank you Futuregrail for opening up this place, it has been very helpful in my Vintage Watch appreciation journey ü´∂.

Will be back to learn more again üôå

I made a visit in September with my partner and left 1.5 hours later having good vibes from the conversations with the senior timepiece advisor Sam. Not only did Sam gave us a personal guided tour of the watches on showcase (which we didn't expect), he was generous in sharing what he knows and patiently entertained all the questions that we had. Thank you Sam! :)

Will recommend anyone keen to be acquainted more knowledge on luxury watches to pay a visit to FutureGrail, it's free after all!

Loved the experience of being at the FutureGrail showroom with rare collectibles. Ability to chill and learn from the helpful team.

Met another collector who gave me insight that there is a skilled watch repairer at the Showroom who can service/repair the watches easily.

I was blown away by the exceptional service I received from FutureGrail! Their team is not only incredibly knowledgeable and professional but also provided me with invaluable insights and personalized recommendations. Their collection of rare and unique wristwatches, pocket watches, and artifacts is truly impressive. If you're in the market for high-end timepieces, I'd highly recommend them! Their dedication to their clients and genuine passion for their work really shine through!
